summary:
So you\'ve gained yourself a follower, 
but you don\'t know a thing or two about what he/she specializes in?
Well why don\'t you just ask them? :P
descriptionHtml:
[center]So you\'ve gained yourself a follower,
but you don\'t know a thing or two about what he/she specializes in?
Well why don\'t you just ask them? :P

[color=green][b]Description:[/b][/color]
This adds a dialogue option to followers that enables you to see their skills.
No more accessing the console and using getAV command :P

[color=red][b]UPDATE:[/b] Had to redo AskFollowerSkills in v1.4 since there are so many changes so its taking me quite a long time to get the alignments right. I\'ve decided to release the font support individually for the time being until I complete them all and then I\'ll also upload a complete package to replace the seperate ones :)[/color]

[color=red][b]This mod is included in[/b][/color] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14228]Big Dialogue Overhaul[/url]

[b]Note 1: Spacing/Formatting may vary with other fonts.[/b]
[b]Note 2: Some words may be shortened to fit the alignement.[/b]
[b]Note 3: Please Let me know If I may have missed some followers, Thanks. :)[/b]
[b]Note 4: FONTS NOT INCLUDED in package, see the recommendations below.[/b]
[b]Note 5: I\'ll try to release versions for other fonts in the recommendations below :)[/b]

[u]Recent Changelog:[/u]
Apr. 00, 2012 - v1.4[list]
[*]Remade AskFollowerSkills.esp
[*]Health, Magicka and Stamina values included
[*]Armor Rating and Resistances Included
[*]Fixed Dialogue option for hirelings[/list]


[color=green][u][b]Up Next:[/b][/u][list][/color]
[*]v1.4 Morpheus Font Support
[*]v1.4 Fertigo Pro Font Support
[*]v1.4 Fhaarkas Fertigo Pro Font Support
[*]v1.4 Centaur Font Support
[*]v1.4 Andalus Font Support
[*]v1.4 Tara Type Font Support[/list]

[color=red][b]UPDATE:[/b] DELETE all files from v1.3 if going to use v1.4[/color]

[color=green][b]Installation (I recommend installing with NMM for v1.3; v1.4 is Manual Installation only)[/b][/color]
Choose either:

1.) Automatic Download with NMM[list]
[*]Click the \'Download with manager\' button on top of the file.
[*]Ask Follower Skills will appear in in NMM\'s Mods list once it\'s downloaded. Double-click to activate it.
[*]Select the font you are currently using.
[*]If Fhaarkas\' Fertigo Pro font selected, Select a fontconfig for it.
[*]Done[/list]

2.) Manual Download with NMM[list]
[*]Run NMM and click on \'Mods\'.
[*]Click on \'Add Mod From File\' and select the downloaded archive file.
[*]Ask Follower Skills will appear in in NMM\'s Mods list once it\'s downloaded. Double-click to activate it.
[*]Select the font you are currently using.
[*]If Fhaarkas\' Fertigo Pro font selected, Select a fontconfig for it.
[*]Done[/list]

3.) Manual Installation without NMM[list]
[*]Extract the contents to a temporary location.	
[*]Locate your Skyrim data folder. Typically it\'s found at \'Program Files/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/\'.
[*]Copy/Cut \"AskFollowerSkill.esp\" to the data folder.
[*]Select the Font you are using and Copy/Cut the \"Scripts\" folder to the data folder.
[*]If going to use Fhaarkas\' Fertigo Pro font, select a fontconfig type from the fontconfigs folder and copy/cut the \"Interface\" folder to the data folder.
[*]Done[/list]

[b]*Note on Fhaarkas Fertigo Pro font support[/b][list]
[*]You need to install \"Fhaarkas Font Replacement\" first from the link in the recommendations below.[/list]


[color=green][b]Compatibilities:[/b][/color][list]
[*]Should be compatible with any mod about followers
[*]Should be compatible with created followers
[*]Dialogue option will not appear during rehire to created hirelings[/list]

[color=green][b]v1.4[/b][/color] Currently supported fonts:[list]
[*]Futura Condensed (Vanilla Font)
[*]Magic Cards[/list]

[color=green][b]v1.3[/b][/color] Currently supported fonts:[list]
[*]Futura Condensed (Vanilla Font)
[*]Fertigo Pro
[*]Fhaarkas\' Fertigo Pro
[*]Magic Cards
[*]Morpheus
[*]MorpheusLarge[/list]

The Futura Condensed version is also available at the steam workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13119

[b]Smorrelli\'s Review:[/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KYADCQlsHMM
[b]Featured on IGN:[/b] http://pc.ign.com/articles/121/1219720p1.html

Thank you Gambolputty for your Detect Skills Spell mod which gave me the idea to make this :D
You can use his mod with mine :) http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=11511&searchtext=

Recommendations:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=95]\"Main Font Replacement\" by Valistar[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=479]\"Fhaarkas Font Replacement\" by Fhaarkas[/url][/center]
